评论详情: Saturated color (blue), good stitching, good structure. A very nice garment. I'm 5'3, 114 lbs., 35-27-34 & bought a medium. It drapes nicely. Maybe could have worn a size small but I prefer a roomier fit. I'm very pleased.
But otherwise I love this blouse It's feminine and refined and makes me pay attention to my posture
Launders well. Fits well.  Lots of compliments every time I wear it.  Narrowed at waist which adds to it's charm.

This blouse is very flattering, and helps create the illusion of curves.  I have a large bust (40DD), but from there down, I lack curves. I've been told I have an "athletic," rectangular or inverted triangle shape. The peplum on this blouse gives just enough width at my hips to give me an hourglass silhouette.  The color is a deep red, leaning toward a wine color. A great choice for holiday dressing, since it can be paired with a skirt or dressy pants.

评论概述: It didn't look good on me.
评论详情: if I were tall and thin it would have been a good look for me. Unfortunately as a 5' 108 person who holds her weight in her top and mid section, it did nothing for me. I thought given the style, the material would be softer instead of a crisp and thin.

I like the style and the material quality is good, heavy weighted. One of the cuffs was missing a button. I happened to have two blue buttons in my sewing kit that worked to sew on each cuff. I have an hour glass figure so this is very flattering.

I always have issues with button down blouses because they tend to gape at the chest or fit me like a paper bag if they don't. Let's face it; most button-downs are just not cut for women with breasts higher than a size A. Often I find the darts are placed so high on the shirt that it's laughable cuz they sit on top of my boobs.  THIS shirt is a pleasant surprise.  I am around a 38c and bought the size L. It fits me perfectly, flattering my waistline without feeling tight and allowing me room for the girls without gaping.  The sleeve length is perfect. The fabric is of a substantial enough thickness that there's no show thru (at least not for the light blue color that I got).  The blouse works perfectly with a nice patterned boucle blazer for work.  I have to work a booth at a professional networking event in a couple of days and will be wearing this with confidence.
I had to return the blouse because it was too big but it is a beautiful blouse. I will be purchasing a smaller size here in the near future.
Nice!

I have not actually worn it yet, but I did try it on and the fit is super cute! I’ve always wanted to wear button ups, but they do not typically shape my apple shaped body the way I like, but this one does! I’ll definitely be using it in the office soon and will he ordering another color!
I got a size small, but it's more of a medium. Comes big
The gathered waist on this blouse helps define your outfit.  While I love the loose fit for comfort sometimes you got to cinch it in and present differently.  This blouse was on point!
The jacket is great.  It's a nice fabric and fits well.  I would definitely order this brand again. In the

I got a size Xl, and while the torso is very flattering, the yoke is too wide. Normally that’s not too much an issue, but this shirt has fancy puff sleeves. I plan to wear a sweater over it, so no worries. It has a good stretch.
Fabric is a bit stretchy and not stiff.  XL fits me perfectly (I am a size 16).  Love this brand and have other pieces of it.

I wanted a cinched waist blouse for a skirt. Love the elastic in back… and it is short ( not too short) so it looks nice with a skirt or pants. Not a fan of puffed sleeves.. but keeping it anyway. I returned the Ivory.. it was more of a yellow beige… re-ordered the white!
Fantastic

I highly recommend this specific top from Grace Karin. I love the fabric they used and the style is unique. I ended up ordering in different colors.I hope to see more of this type of fabric in other dresses or tops.
It fit perfectly and looks great.  Looking forward to wearing it this fall.
Small ,nice looking- never got refunded? Be careful with refund!!!!I just found out about many items were not refunded????Reason ?Saying call customer service.I’m going to call- need explanation!!!

This shirt has a nice shape and is made out of comfortable material. The only issue is that the arms are cut in such a way that it is difficult to lift your arms past 45 degrees. If you do lift your arms higher than that, the shirt bunches and pulls up.

The fabric soft, washes well didn't shrink, irons well and comfortable. The only reason not a 5 star I could use an extra small and it’s not available. I ordered the white. I am 34 D and 145 bought a small.

I ordered my regular size after reading their sizing chart but couldn't even button it, many inches too small. Pretty style though but order a size up! Also not suitable for long-waisted people, that is why I didn't reorder in the next size, I just returned this item.
This blouse has a rouched back which gives a flattering waist and a smooth front. The fabric is light weight and the stitching is good.  Very cute with a belt if you choose to add one.

评论概述: I loved this shirt. Very flattering.
评论详情: The only thing I did not like was how it was shrink wrapped so that the wrinkles are hard to get out. But it looks amazing on me and very comfortable, versatile, price was great. You should definitely get one. I got black

I love this shirt!! It's exactly the vibe I was looking for (I got it for a renfaire costume), but I'm lucky I've got a corset that's going over it. When I first tried it on I had black pants on, and you could clearly see where my pants started through the shirt, as well as the extra fabric where the shirt overlaps. An actual button up shirt though, unlike some others I've gotten. Also didn't shrink when I washed it, but I did wash it by itself on a cold cycle.

Love it. Fits well.

Unfortunately, much as I loved the blue color and style of this blouse, although the waist was slightly snug, the bust was too big. I normally wear a small but ordered a medium because of the snug waist. I will be returning.
Looks very neat and stylish.
I usually wear between a small and a medium. I ordered medium in this shirt but it’s a little tight.

I liked the way it looked on the model on website, but not on me does it look the same,  even though I'm a model and liked that it was called Grace Karin.  Fabric is not so good and poor quality buttons.  Sad that I have to return it.
It was over size  and l don't know  whether  my money  was refunded

I like the blouse, color, style and shape. It fit and was very comfortable. The material is soft against my skin. The thickness of the material was just right.  I think it’s a great value for my money.

Color is not white. Fabric very thin and see-through. Definitely not worth the price. Returning this.

Cute style and color but the fabric is an odd feeling like a plastic bag or something. It’s noisey and washing it didn’t help at all.
Order a size up. Buttons gap from top to bottom, I do not have a large chest and buttons open leaving gaps.

I’ve received many a compliment when wearing this shirt. I have sent the link for others to purchase. If I would recommend to friends- I would recommend to you! I plan on purchasing in different colors. It’s lightweight & comfortable. I take it right out of the dryer- no wrinkles!

Nice top and comfortable.

Very comfortable and elegant!!
The material is soft and good quality. I’m 5’” 185 and a XL fits perfect. Color is right on. Style is classy. Came wrinkled had to Iron it.

This top is a bit pricey, but perfect otherwise, 10/10. Style, quality, buttons, design for large-chested women, fabric thickness, a little stretch to it. Looks and feel expensive. Comfortable too!

The material seems somewhat quality but the shirt in white is so see though that you could clearly see my nude bra. Where the fabric is double layered you can see it more white. This shirt might be nice in a darker color but definitely not in white.
Very nice shirt looks great on the body.....especially with pants. I have bought it in white, red and black!!!! I have a short torso and it makes my body look longer!!!! love it
Color was exactly as pictured. I’m chubby and this Fits perfectly and gives me a nice silhouette. I’ll be ordering more in different colors
Good as advertised

I absolutely love this; falls at the perfect spot on my hips and is super flattering.  I just ordered three more colors.  I used their size chart for sizing and fits perfectly.  Not too big, not too snug.
The material is nice. The shirt fits well. I bought a large and am 5 foot 5 inch and right now weigh 176. Shirt is perfect for hybrid office days. I plan to buy some in the other colors is made well.
This product is true to size and it sits very well on me.

This blouse is of great quality, runs true to size,  flatters my figure and I really.like the basic styling with a little extra flair....buying in two more colors! Surprised what I got for this price. Definitely needs pressing or steaming, and I do wish the ends of the sleeve would drape and balloon a bit more like the photo; I honestly blame that on my long arms. Well done.
You may need to order a size larger than you actually wear however the blouse is beautiful

Bought the gray to wear with black pants.  This is such a pretty blouse.  I am between a med and small (losing weight) but it is slightly snug (small), so I will wait a few more pounds to wear it.  But I jut bought the red in med so I can wear it now.  Material feels wonderful.  It does have some stretch in the middle due to the way it's made in the back.  As others said, if you are very busty (D/above), might want to size up.

Very flattering fit. Shows off my waistline, while covering the lower belly pooch. Good weight to the material.  I got a size small (I'm 5'0", 130lbs) in blue (it's a light grayish blue), not see-through at all. Very happy with this purchase.

Follow the size guide and you'll have a very cute, elegant, flattering top. I brought it in red and black and absolutely love the silhouette and colors.  The neckline also goes up high enough to not show anything, which makes this very appropriate for business.

Blouse is a lot more heavy due to the material used. Thought it would be much lighter. The blouse is well made and the size small on me has some extra room rather than more form fitting. Will wash it on delicate, cold water and delicate dry. Then we will see if the results are good or not.  I did wash the blouse in my front loader on delicate. Dried on permanent press. Turned out great! No need for iron when you remove from dryer quickly.
perfect fit

I ordered a large because I wear a size medium/large in other women's clothing. Every where but the bust fit perfectly. I am a 38DDD. I had to return and reorder an XL. Love the color and style.
